page.title: 18HIGHLAND DANCING
page.content: Highland Dancing is a very popular dance in Fort William. I interviewed Bryony Kirk and Suzanne Walker. Bryony has been dancing for one and a half years Suzanne has also been dancing for one and a half years. {Question,what are the main steps? Answer Bryony answered the main steps are 1st, 2nd, and 4th. Question what is your favourite dance? Answer Suzanne said my favourite dance is the Sword Dance. Bryonys favourite dance is the highland fling.{Question what {day are the dancing classes held? Answer, The classes are held in the Scout Hall on Saturdays from 2pm till 3pm.{Question Have you ever danced {in the Highland games?}Answer, Suzanne answered no we have neverbeen asked to dance in the Highland Games.{Question {who teaches you to dance?}Answer, Mary Mac,coll said Bryony.
